channel.title: How do u change the way npcs face?
channel.description:
does anyone know how u change the way an npc faces because ive been trying to do this for a wh now but i can't figure it out.
help plz! and thanks for the help[br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2007, 07:37:47 PM[/size][hr]does anyone know how u change the way an npc faces because ive been trying to do this for a wh now but i can't figure it out.
help plz! and thanks for the help

item.title: How do u change the way npcs face?
item.dc:creator: @Phore Phore
item.description:
@Phore wrote:

funtwo:

phore if u could find out i would be in your debt

The core does not support NPC orientation that I can detect.

Read full topic

item.title: How do u change the way npcs face?
item.dc:creator: @Phore Phore
item.description:
@Phore wrote:

[quote=“funtwo, post:1, topic:112998”]does anyone know how u change the way an npc faces because ive been trying to do this for a wh now but i can’t figure it out.

help plz!
and thanks for the help[br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2007, 07:37:47 PM[/size][hr]does anyone know how u change the way an npc faces because ive been trying to do this for a wh now but i can’t figure it out.

help plz!
and thanks for the help[/quote]

I am not entirely sure the core supports the orientation of NPCs. When mine is finished, I’ll release it, minus all the SQL structure and data, of course…
